biotools.summary:
One Molecular Fingerprint to Rule them All.

Extended-Benchmark: compounds and query lists used for the peptide benchmark.

MAP4-Similarity-Search: source code for the similarity search app.

Supplementary Material for the manuscript: "One Molecular Fingerprint to Rule them All: Drugs, Biomolecules, and the Metabolome".

TMAPs of the ChEMBL, non-Lipinski ChEMBL, Human Metabolome, SwissProt up to 50 residues sequences, and Drugbank MAP4 Chemical Space.
